page.title: 08Marylebone and Bayswater
page.content: Edgeware Road i.e. Watling Street runs diagonally across this block and ends at Marble Arch,a monument with a queerly displaced air,within shouting distance of Speakers Corner. To the south is Bayswater Road,and to the south again is the sand surfaced Ring,once so fashionable and still used by riders exercising their horses. Between Oxford St. and Marylebone Rd. has always been, and remains,a sought after residential area. North of the Marylebone Rd. stands Marylebone Station, an attractive, small scale mainline station.The station is currently under threat of closure. The east of the block is bordered by Baker St.,with its many associations, and to the west the Westway soars up in a rising curve from the Marylebone Road.
